title: ISic003637. I.Sicily inscription 003637
body:
Facsimile Images

+ [Cl]ạụdius Iu[st]us I[Ivir et patro-]
nus ṃụṇicip[i] Ṃẹ[lit](ensium) [---]
ṃạṛmoreụṃ cum ṣimụ[lacro ---]
et [o]ṃni ṣụo orṇạtu p̣ṛ[o honore]
5decuriọṇạṭụṣ + [C]laud[di ---]
secundum pollicita[tionem suam]
exstruxit consecra[vitque in]
quod opus amplius qua[m promiserat]
erogavi[t ---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of Christol and Pirino 2010 (after EDR)

English translation

Claudius Iustus, duumvir and patron of the municipium of Melita [---] built and consecrated in accordance with his promise, a marble [podium? temple?] with a statue [---] and all its ornaments for the honour of the decurionship of Claudius [---], for which work he spent more than he had promised

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.8318 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
